long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Core Terminal is a Web3-powered exchange designed for AI infrastructure. This Chrome extension provides you with access to AI resources and manage your assets.
Features:
Access and manage AI resources and infrastructure
Real-time Updates: Stay updated on AI resource performance, transactions, and  balances.
Easy Access: Conveniently access your Core Terminal account and perform tasks

By contributing unused computing power, storage, or mobile bandwidth, users can earn rewards while supporting AI projects. The platform also enables easy access to shared AI models for training data. 

Whether you're a developer, researcher, or business, The Core Terminal offers a seamless way to engage with AI  technology. Download the extension to unlock innovative AI opportunities in a decentralized ecosystem.
